question: Can you create a plan for a 3-day team building retreat with a focus on outdoor activities and team workshops?
true_answer: A comprehensive plan for a 3-day retreat including outdoor activities such as hiking and team workshops for skill-building and collaboration.

plan.current_objective: Complete detailed plan for 3-day team building retreat

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Selected location offers hiking, kayaking; workshops will focus on communication and problem-solving skills.

steps.content: Can you create a plan for a 3-day team building retreat with a focus on outdoor activities and team workshops?
Creating initial plan: 1) Identify potential retreat locations. 2) Research outdoor activities. 3) Plan team workshops. 4) Develop detailed schedule.
Decomposing into location selection, activity research, workshop planning, and schedule creation.
Assigning location identification to researcher.
Searching for suitable locations for a 3-day retreat with outdoor facilities.
Found potential locations with hiking trails, kayaking options.
Marking location identification complete.
Assigning outdoor activities research to browser.
Gathering information on available outdoor activities at selected locations.
Activities include guided hiking tours, kayaking, and group challenges.
Updating plan with available activities.
Assigning workshop planning to analyzer.
Designing workshops focusing on communication and problem-solving.
Workshops will include role-playing scenarios and group discussions.
Marking workshop planning complete.
Assigning schedule creation to principal_agent.
Creating detailed schedule combining outdoor activities and workshops.
Schedule complete with balanced time for activities and workshops.
Finalizing plan and updating memory.
Archiving retreat plan and key activities for future reference.
